subject: ubuntu 7.4
body:
Hi

Just downloaded the live cd for 7.4

Anyone know how to get past the orca preferences area.

Just seem to be able to tab between preferences and quit?

Sorry if not the right place to ask but notice some mention on the list.

All docs seem to be for previous version.

Thanks

Keith Barrett
